comment: Hardworking and passionate guy about his research work. Often we used to board the same train from home state to Indore or vice-versa. I still remember our 1st interaction at Gate 1 when I was going home ðŸ˜‚. All the best brother, tuu khub agad vadhe evi shubhechchaa bhaii!
name: Dhruvil Thakkar (DT)
